reviews.review: Dead by Daylight é muito divertido porem é um jogo onde você depende de seus companheiros e muitas das vezes o trabalho em equipe não prevalence, principalmente nos ranks iniciais, quando comprar o jogo tenha isso em mente, começe a jogar com amigos ou tenha muita paciencia para aprender a jogar e subir seu rank.

Good game

Yes, the game has its flaws. Dedicated servers are missing, it lacks a proper party/friends system while still encouraging you to play with your friends, it has bugs here and there, but it's a great game overall. If you're like me and you like the idea of PvP, but have always been repelled by insta headshots and similar while not being able to hold your ground at all because your aim comes from the seventh circle of hell, this is the game for you. Yes, there are some mechanics that require you to aim, but they are very few and don't have to be utilized at all.

Beware, the community can be a bit toxic, but don't be offended by that. The game is too much fun for that.

Frust, Freude, Leid, Lachkrämpfe, Herzinfakte, Wutanfälle, Zorn, Menschen die ALT+F4 lieben, Spannung, TEAM Play *hust!
Killer die freundlich mit einem die Karte bereisen!

Alles zusammengefasst ein sehr unterhaltsames Spiel!

Хороший игра

Dead by Daylight is a great assymetrical multiplayer horror game that offers a great variety of playable survivors and killers. Survivors must work together or alone to undermine the killer efforts to kill or sacrifice each one of the 4 survivors by opening the gates (powered by 5 generators or 4 if a survivor disconnected early on before the started) or finding the black lock, which can be found with a lot of search or with a good amount of luck, usually after the second generator is primed. Only if all other survivors are dead or gone or if you a special key will the black lock be opened (all survivors can escape if one of them has the key, but the black lock won't remain opened for long, less than 8 seconds). Each survivors have a talent tree and can be swap, the same as for the killers.

Each killer have their own gameplay advantages and weaknesses and their own capabilities can be swap the more you develop each of your own killers's talent tree (which is called the bloodweb). The developpers added this year a store within the game, opening the door to microtransactions (for better or worse). This led to some benificial and fun new features; a more accessable cosmetics store which, instead of buying a full dlc for some new cosmetics, you can use your iridescent shards, which were before gained at a slower pace and were only applicable on the shrine of secrets until last spring, to purchase at a great cost, depending on the quality of the item (13500 shards for a full rare cosmetic set or 4500 for each of the 3 pieces). The same is applicable to unlock a DLC character (9000 shards each) unless it's a licensed character (movie killers like Michael Myers and so forth). The shrine of secret is now pricier than ever, ranging between 2000 and 2400 shards (the latter if you do not own the character). The new curency, Auric cells, is literrally your money 
converted into their own system and the only alternate way to get licenced killers or survivors(which is really isn't an alternate option since (on Steam) you need to buy the DLC (or chapters) anyway ).

What makes the game still fun to play today, with new games coming up and the new microtransactions?

First, with all due respects, microtransactions are almost in every game of this type, if not 50% of the entire gaming industry, so let's see it's handled in this game. Does it affect the core gameplay? Do you need to pay to win? Not at all. You can get each perk from each killer or survivor from the shrine of secrets, which 4 perks are presented and changed every week. 3 of the most viable killers, if not the best and favorite among most players, are free for each player (Nurse, hillbilly and huntress). The Iconic trapper and the infamous wraith (althought it's my personnal favorite) are also available from the start, so all players aren't left without a good arsenal as a killer. The same goes for survivors. The iridiscent shards are gained with a new leveling systems, which resets at level 100 and adds a level to your devotion, which makes shards grind always available and within reach. The way you spend them is up to you. So you can have a new character without paying more than the actual game and with the new chapters added to the game, a great rooster of survivors and killers await you in the store. 

Second, the developpers are dedicated to the players and do their best hear you out, even if they don't do as you always want. With the Halloween blight event, which you were supposed to only get one cosmetic from the event, was changed at the last minute at the call of angered fans, for one for killer and survivor, a total of 2 available, at the cost of 30 killer vials and 30 survivors vials of blight, the event currency. This led to most survivor players trying to play as killer, which led to an interesting new dynamic within the game, but also led to a drastic decline of survivors within the game. The developpers reacted quickly and made the numbers of maximum vials to sixty, no matter what gameplay you choose and the event went smoothly and the players were happy with the outcome. The developpers do make mistakes, but make up for it, take notes, adapt fast and make this game dynamic and interesting. They got a lot planned ahead, one well deserved change for Freddy Killer's gameplay, considered the worst killer, if not for you, worst licensed killer available (again a killer I love to play with, although I wish the character would have multiple cosmetic change with every Robert Englund's portrayal of the iconic character). With such available and dedicated developpers, I think with this game is worth a shot, as they don't show any sign of slowing down and they created a great community, to my belief.

Third, it's one of the first game in the industry to do this style of game and to their merit, made a great dynamic gameplay, which keep you tense, stressed, tactical and each player, for better or worse, shows so many answers to each gameplay, killer or survivor, that in my mind, it's trully interesting to watch and learn from. A game I love and that I hope, some folks will show their love to it. 

Thanks all for reading my review. I wish a great game experience to you all while enjoying this gem.

Dead by Daylight — компьютерная игра в жанре survival horror с видом от первого и третьего лица, разработанная канадской компанией Behaviour Interactive на движке Unreal Engine 4. Игра была выпущена в Steam 14 июня 2016 года.

Bon jeux

Globalement ce jeu est sympathique, d'avantage avec des amies que en solo.

Petit bref du gameplay :
Vous pouvez incarner soit un survivant, soit un tueur. Dans chaque partie, il y a 4 survivants, ils doivent réparer 5 générateurs et ensuite ouvrir les portes de sorties pour s'enfuir. Cependant le tueur va faire tout son possible pour les empêcher, le but du tueur est de suspendre les survivants à des crochets pour accomplir un rituel pour une entité surnaturelle. 

Chaque survivant et chaque tueur possède des capacité qui leurs sont uniques et donc influencent leurs façon de jouer. Chaque tueur possède un pouvoir spécifique.

Le gameplay est facilement pris en main à l'aide d'un tutoriel très simple. Mais on va pas se mentir, vous comprendrez rapidement les petits trucs et astuces au cours de vos parties. 

Comme tout jeux, celui-ci possède des bugs qui peuvent être plus ou moins gênant mais cela n'empêche pas son immersion dans le jeu.

Le contenue est régulièrement mis à jour, nouveaux tueurs, survivants, cartes etc..

Par contre, les temps de chargements ont tendances à être long et pour trouver un lobby, la recherche peut être relativement longue.

J'espère que mon avis, vous auras éclairez sur le jeu

Hex: No one cares

C'est un jeux sympas pour jouer en COOP ( Meilleure entente en survivants ^^ ).

Points négatifs : Le tueur à trop d'avantage sur le survivant. Difficile d'apprécier le jeux dans les débuts, pas de serveurs propre au jeu. Le tueur est l'hôte , donc si il a une mauvaise connexion je vous conseil de relancer une recherche ( en fonction du ping que vous allez voir ).
Points positifs : Ambiance effrayante , le jeux de cache cache entre survivant et tueur est plutôt sympas.

Je recommande ce jeux, même si vous risquez de crier au scandale un bon nombres de fois !
